scripts.setFormatToPrecommitHook:
echo "#!/bin/bash

STAGED_JS_FILES=\$(git diff --cached --name-only --diff-filter=ACM | grep -E '\.(tsx?|js)\$' || true)

if [ -n "\$STAGED_JS_FILES" ]; then
  echo "\$STAGED_JS_FILES" | xargs npx prettier --write --ignore-unknown || exit 1
  echo "\$STAGED_JS_FILES" | xargs npx eslint --fix || exit 1
  echo "\$STAGED_JS_FILES" | xargs git add
fi" > .git/hooks/pre-commit && chmod +x .git/hooks/pre-commit
scripts._itDoesNotWork:
echo '
ğŸ” Troubleshooting the react project...
' && echo '
ğŸ“¦ Step 1: Installing Node dependencies
' && npm install --silent && echo 'âœ… Node dependencies installed successfully!' && echo '
ğŸ”„ Step 2: Checking if Vite dev server is running
' && (pgrep -f "vite" > /dev/null && echo 'âœ… Vite dev server is running') || echo 'âŒ Vite dev server is not running. Start it with: npm run dev' && echo '
âœ… Basic troubleshooting complete. If issues persist, please ask for help.'
scripts.test:e2e:report: cd e2e && allure generate ./allure-results --clean && allure open
